name: Breast Functional Genomics (BFG)
tagline: Data for "The Functional Genomic Landscape  of Human Breast Cancer Drivers, Vulnerabilities, and Resistance"
body:
### Manuscript

"Functional Genomic Landscape  of Human Breast Cancer Drivers,  Vulnerabilities, and Resistance"

Richard Marcotte\*, Azin Sayad\*, Kevin R. Brown, Felix Sanchez-Garcia, Jüri Reimand, Maliha Haider, Carl Virtanen, James E. Bradner, Gary D. Bader, Gordon B. Mills, Dana Pe’er, Jason Moffat and Benjamin G. Neel

(\* Equal Contributions)

PMID:

[LINK] [PDF]



### Links to Data on GEO

shRNA screens ([GSE74702](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE74702]))


RNAseq ([GSE73526](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE73526))



### Genomics and Proteomics Data Files

RNAseq Per-Gene log2-FPKM
* [per-gene log2 FPKM](http://RNASEQ)
* [per-gene normalized log2 FPKM](https://github.com/neellab/bfg/blob/gh-pages/data/rnaseq/breast_rnaseq_qn.txt.zip?raw=true): As above, but also Quantile-Normalized, and a floor value set at log2(0.1) FPKM (or -3.332 log2-FPKM). This version was used in the manuscript analyses.

CNA Per-Gene Log-R Ratios [LINK]


miRNA [PROCESSED] [BATCH1] [BATCH2] [BATCH3]


RPPA [LINK]



### Annotation Files

Breast cancer cell line subtypes [LINK]

[updated shRNA annotations](https://github.com/neellab/bfg/blob/gh-pages/data/annotations/hairpin_annotations.txt.zip?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
